title: Four bells commence tolling together and toll at intervals of 12, 14, 16, and 18 seconds respectively. In 60 minutes, how many times do they toll together? - Quora

response.answer_text: 60 mins =3600 secs 12 sec bell in 3600 secs it rings =3600/12 =300 times taking it rings at 0 sec +1 =301 14 sec bell in 3600 secs it rings =3600/14 =257 times taking it rings at 0 sec +1=258 16 sec bell in 3600 secs it rings =3600/16=225 times taking it rings at 0 sec +1=226 18 sec bell in 3600 secs it rings =3600/18=200 times taking it rings at 0 sec +1=201 adding=301 +258 +226 +201= 1006 times they toll together
